about_the_game:
SeaBed Audio Novel Collection is a series of newly written audio novels for the beloved yuri-themed mystery visual novel.

Episode 3 - "Silvergrass Station Cleaning". - Length: 17:56.

An unexpected visitor. A car ride. A quiet station.

The episodes are delivered in both a subtitled video format, and a Japanese audio-only track in .wav format.

The video supports Japanese, Japanese (closed captions), English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and Korean subtitles which can be switched at will.

Staff

  • Produced by Fruitbat Factory
  • Original Concept by Paleontology
  • Scenario by hide38
  • Directed by AKIRA
  • Illustration by Tonbu

Starring

  • Mizuno Sachiko (Narrator & High Schooler): Kondo Yui
  • Takako: Matsui Eriko
  • Izuhana Midori: Aiya Saki
  • Weather Report, Coffee Shop Owner: Tokiwa Shouhei

Disclaimer: Video subtitles may not display correctly on some video players. In such a case, please try changing the subtitle settings or using another video player.
